website_summaries.verdict: Incredible value; features are comparable to models twice the price. Reputable semirigid design.
pros: Dimmable LED lights help navigate even the darkest environments
Points for visibility for bright yellow cord
cons: There is a bit of a learning curve with the app
Wireless connection can be interrupted unexpectedly

customer_reviews.title: Semi ridged endoscope with color camera and wifi capable water proof 2 MP borescope.
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased a couple endoscopes didn't hold up after a few uses. wiring! This one has better cable actually stiff wire built in to aid in pushing through a pipe etc. The clarity of the camera is good not, HD but color and good enough for viewing obstructions. It will fit in any 1/2" tubing as long as there are no tee's or 90's in the way. I was able to make it turn a 90 in a 1" pipe fairly easy. so far I'm impressed with this scope for $20.00. Thinking of grabbing another one just as back-up if something goes just when you need most, I funny that way. Definite good buy!
customer_reviews.author: Airgun Junky

customer_reviews.title: Be careful where you put that thing,
customer_reviews.text: This is a Good one ,it works really well , good optics and clear picture, a mouse came right up to the lens and scared the heck out of me, it looked like it was bigger than i am. Wow jump back jack , watch were you send that thing . Anyway cant go wrong for the price
customer_reviews.author: DAN-0

customer_reviews.title: WORK GREAT. You need to be close to object to see clearly but cant beat price.
customer_reviews.text: I had it only a few week but used it repeatedly,10 feet down in the water, behind walls and in AC equipment. When I ruin this one I will replace it with another. Easy hook up to your phone and cheep enough to not worry about breaking.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Works fairly well, but focal length not short enough
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to inspect a drain and got this. It's OK, it works, and comes with a spare camera head. But it has to be an inch or two away from things to focus, and that's kind of exactly not what's likely to be happening down in a pipe. Controlling where it's looking is very hard, but that's not its fault I guess, but the long focal length makes it almost impossible to find your way around the pipe. But, it worked, and was simple to operate - just connect your phone to the endoscope's internal wifi, and use the app mentioned here to view.
customer_reviews.author: Pow

customer_reviews.title: Overall great value
customer_reviews.text: This camera was just what I needed. It was easy to set up and the price was right. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Lawes

customer_reviews.title: good quality
customer_reviews.text: the pictures and video taken is reasonably good quality, the problem is the wire isn't rigid enough to hold the camera high even for low hight around 60 cm high. other than this its good. the connection to the app is simple
customer_reviews.author: mohamed soud

customer_reviews.title: I like it
customer_reviews.text: Easy to connect WiFi, down loaded app and installed, turned on camera, wifi connection found and cellphone connect. Launched app, pressed "play" and great picture. Easy to use adjustment controls, flip or 90 degree rotate. Take movie or picture mode. Light brightness control on device wheel and push the start button also snaps a picture. Over all nice.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Quality product, easy to set up, does the job
customer_reviews.text: Connected right away, assisted in a buried pipe project in about 45 mins. Good product, especially for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great gadget to have on hand for a multitude of projects
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to use and sync to my iPhone. I used it for automotive purposes, but now I’m happy to have it for any odd jobs around the house that may require a scope! The cable is nice and rigid and holds its form well!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Blurry
customer_reviews.text: Awful. Very blurry, so it was worthless. I returned it for another brand around the same price that actually works.
customer_reviews.author: Larry Bell

customer_reviews.title: Awesome for looking into small places
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to find a bracelet that had fallen behind a raised floor. It's an amazing tool for finding small items. Found the bracelet in seconds. Very small camera with awesome resolution. Well worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Garrick

customer_reviews.title: After you master start up it is easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Purchased to trace wires in sheet rock walls and ceiling by drilling 1/4 holes every 6 ft. Worked fantastic. Looked in a wall before hanging a cabinet and found a gas line. Life saver! Worth its weight in gold
customer_reviews.author: FrankD

customer_reviews.title: It’s $20 not $180
customer_reviews.text: Plumber with 11 years exp here. The camera has poor visual focus range. I can’t see 9” away from the lense. The wire doesn’t support the camera or allow dexterous movement further than a few feet. It is totally worth $20. I have submerged it in water and dropped it it’s durable.
customer_reviews.author: Kaper

customer_reviews.title: No app available
customer_reviews.text: Bought this in October of 2019. The app “HD Scope” no longer exists in the iOS App Store. Completely useless without the app. Have tried a dozen others with no success.
customer_reviews.author: David Walling

customer_reviews.title: Does not work
customer_reviews.text: Downloaded the app, connected my phone via WiFi to the device, opened the HD Scope app and it just did not work. No image. Called Amazon and talked to a few people that placed my call on hold and after a few minutes Amazon hanged up my call
customer_reviews.author: Qgent

customer_reviews.title: Works as promised
customer_reviews.text: Scope works great and the app was easy to install and operate.
customer_reviews.author: bludimon

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price
customer_reviews.text: Worked pretty well. The light is not that bright so once you get deep enough the photo quality is pretty grainy and dark.
customer_reviews.author: Kenz Sij

customer_reviews.title: Does not work
customer_reviews.text: The item would not connect to my iPhone. The company wlll tame it back and issue a refund but they expect me to pay return shipping to Canada. In dispute with them through credit card company. I do not recommend this item.
customer_reviews.author: Tony

customer_reviews.title: Cats man
customer_reviews.text: I looked in my ears n noise the most important part I looked was my wife's vajayjay all pink on the inside
customer_reviews.author: Les sakk

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Works well. Just what I needed for under the house.
customer_reviews.author: Bob in Los Angeles

customer_reviews.title: Good value for picture quality
customer_reviews.text: Decent picture quality but I guess for the price it is definitely worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Henry

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Works well. Syncs well with Samsung S10 as well as 2 generation Samsung tablet
customer_reviews.author: Bob Villanueva

customer_reviews.title: Perfect product
customer_reviews.text: Great balance between flexibility and rigidity.. easy to use right out the box
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: App no longer available
customer_reviews.text: Liked it when I could get the app to operate it now it’s unavailable Wtf
customer_reviews.author: greg y.

customer_reviews.title: Well built product
customer_reviews.text: Endoscope set up quickly and was easy to use. Attachments are almost useful as described. And in life there is always a...BUT. And that is the mirror attachment is clouded and not able to work. No image is useful from the mirror. Unfortunate.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Affordable and works great!!!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for the price. Hooks up through WiFi easy, and works great.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Grau

customer_reviews.title: How can i get the ios app
customer_reviews.text: I have HD Scope on one of my devices but I can't find the install URL and I can't share the app from inside of ios. ths is my last resort.
customer_reviews.author: Lucasr

customer_reviews.title: iOS app no longer available , can’t use the product
customer_reviews.text: HD scope is no longer available in iOS App Store .. can’t use the product
customer_reviews.author: Mahesh K Konala

customer_reviews.title: Good camera
customer_reviews.text: Good camera for the price, easy to connect and use.
customer_reviews.author: Ricardo

customer_reviews.title: I am angry.
customer_reviews.text: This is a faulty item. It can't work. Request a replacement for new products.
customer_reviews.author: FUMO HSIAO

customer_reviews.title: Camera
customer_reviews.text: I could never get it to work total waste of money
customer_reviews.author: Charles M. Russell

customer_reviews.title: Good, but needs a brighter LED.
customer_reviews.text: It worked pretty well. But as stated in other reviews, you have to get very close to what your looking for to show up on the screen if it's in a dark place. I don't think the LED light is bright enough to illuminate what you are looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Dale Tarasewicz

product_meta.title: WiFi Endoscope Camera, Semi-Rigid Flexible Wireless Endoscope IP67 Waterproof Borescope 2 MP HD Resolutions Inspection Camera Snake Camera for Android and iOS Smartphone, iPad, Tablet -Yellow (16.4FT)
feature_bullets: 【Semi-Rigid Flexible Cable】The yellow semi-rigid flexible cable is better to allow you to control the direction of the Inspection Camera, especially in a wide variety of confined place, it can be bent and hold its shape to access. This WiFi endoscope has a wide application, it is suitable for various types of environment, such as, low-light or dark area, damp or wet area etc.

【HD RESOLUTION CAMERA】Built in HD CMOS camera, the snake camera endoscope has 3 adjustable resolutions (Resolution:640x480, 1280 x 720 and 1600 x 1200) which can record HD videos and snapshot images to make the image delicate, make the color vivid and give you a better experience.

【High Compatibility & Wireless】The wireless endoscope is designed at the latest technology, this WiFi borescope inspection camera can support both Android equipment(Above Android 4.42) and IOS system(Above IOS 8.0). The endoscope has its own Wi-Fi Signal and a build-in Li-lon rechargeable battery, there is no external cable or adapter needed, all you need to do is to download and install the "HD Scope" app from Google Play or Apple Store and then connect to its WIFI which can be operated easily.

【Wide Range of Uses】The wireless borescope has IP67 waterproof function, built with 8 dimmable LED lights, the diameter of wireless borescope camera is only 9mm, not only easy to get into very small hole of inspection, but also very suitable for Automotive Repair and Maintenance, wall inspection, home appliance inspection, outdoor testing and other industry fields. It helps minimise the need to disassemble machinery for inspection, saving time and money.
【Hassle-free】With up to 18-month worry-free period, replacement or refund can be sent during this period. Please contact us freely if you have any questions about your order.
